titles.title: Affordable Housing Expansion Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for reallocation of abandoned private activity bond volume cap.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/5/2008--Introduced. Affordable Housing Expansion Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow the Secretary of the Treasury to allocate among the states in 2008 and subsequent years unused amounts of authorized private activity bonds for prior calendar years.
